title: Enhancing Practical Machine Learning Competencies: ECG Interpretation Learning-by-Comparison (LbC) Online for Clinical Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners accurately interpret ECGs in 18 clinical scenarios and achieve 80% or higher diagnostic concordance
Learners write and submit a reflective case analysis report reflecting the complexity and uncertainty of clinical judgment
Learners revise the rationale for ECG interpretation decisions at least three times based on peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
